mapper.select: SELECT dgs.group_id AS groupId, dgs.name, dgs.profit_rate AS profitRate, dgs.goods_tag_id AS goodsTagId, dgs.price, dgs.show_price showPrice, dgs.unit, dgs.`desc`, dgs.detail, dgs.status, dgs.thumbnail, dg.name AS groupName, dgt.name AS goodsTagName FROM dgs LEFT JOIN d_group dg ON dg.id = dgs.group_id LEFT JOIN d_goods_tag dgt ON dgt.id = dgs.goods_tag_id WHERE dgs.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( name, profit_rate, goods_tag_id, price, show_price, unit, status, thumbnail, `desc`, group_id, create_date, creator, create_ip ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{profitRate}, #{goodsTagId}, #{price}, #{showPrice}, #{unit}, #{status}, #{thumbnail}, #{desc}, #{groupId}, NOW(), #{creator}, #{createIp} )
